description: Hoses have been requested for the rapid production line. Please provide detaliled specification.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Hoses

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various fire hoses and associated accessories.

### Procurement Details

* Contracting entity: National Defence Canada
* Solicitation number: W8482-231247/B
* Amendment number: 4
* Publication date: May 12, 2023
* Tender closing date: June 16, 2023
* Expected contract start date: June 16, 2023
* Expected contract end date: June 14, 2024
* Regions of delivery: British Columbia, Canada, Nova Scotia

### Tender Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires the following items:

* Item 1: 71 pieces of Fire Hose, SIAMESE CONNECTION (Part No.: BG-104, NCAGE: 20266, ELKHART BRASS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, LLC) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 2: 27 pieces of Connector, PLUG, ELECTRICAL (Part No.: BG-104, NCAGE: 20266, ELKHART BRASS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, LLC) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 3: 352 pieces of Hose Assembly, NONMETALLIC, FIRE FIGHTING (Part No.: 013319BR, NCAGE: 35943, ANGUS FIRE LTD) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 4: 508 pieces of Hose Assembly, NONMETALLIC, FIRE FIGHTING (Part No.: 013319BR, NCAGE: 35943, ANGUS FIRE LTD) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 5: 47 pieces of Hose Assembly, NONMETALLIC, FIRE FIGHTING (Part No.: 013325BR, NCAGE: 35943, ANGUS FIRE LTD) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 6: 20 pieces of Hose Assembly, NONMETALLIC, FIRE FIGHTING (Part No.: 013325BR, NCAGE: 35943, ANGUS FIRE LTD) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
